text: Lubomír Janko (born 13 November 1955) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brno
title: Lubomír Janko
